text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My own chapter in the history of<n>Team Sirius began with
only Mejiro<n>McQueen at my side.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her incredible ability to capture hearts<n>and minds has been
the crux of our<n>team's growth.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But with every person she inspired,<n>the weight of their
expectations grew<n>heavier.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This reminds me—something similar<n>happened before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Just when I was about to break<n>down, you came running
after me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I suppose what happens next will be<n>no different as well.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
It's all I can do. There is just so<n>much I have yet to figure
out as a<n>trainer...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
It's all I can do. There is just so<n>much I have yet to figure
out as a<n>trainer...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I didn't even realize that my hopes<n>for you were turning into
obstacles in<n>your path.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I didn't even realize that my hopes<n>for you were turning into
obstacles in<n>your path.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But it's not just that we expect a lot<n>from you... You've
inspired everyone<n>on Team Sirius.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But it's not just that we expect a lot<n>from you... You've
inspired everyone<n>on Team Sirius.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
How can you find inspiration in<n>someone who can't even
run<n>according to race rules?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Someone who has caused so much<n>nuisance toward my
fellow racers,<n>and even my trainer?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Because we have faith in you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Because we have faith in you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No matter how many mistakes trip<n>you up along the way...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No matter how many mistakes trip<n>you up along the way...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You'll keep going, and we'll keep<n>cheering.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You'll keep going, and we'll keep<n>cheering.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: We believe in you, and that's notchanging just because of a bad raceor two!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: We believe in you, and that's notchanging just because of a bad raceor two!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Remember what they said about<n>Oguri? That she couldn't
win<n>anymore?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But everyone on the team supported<n>Oguri right until the
very end.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But everyone on the team supported<n>Oguri right until the
very end.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No matter the results, she went into<n>every race determined
to make us<n>proud—and that's what made her our<n>ace.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No matter the results, she went into<n>every race determined
to make us<n>proud—and that's what made her our<n>ace.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: An "ace"... Someone the team takes<n>pride in, win or lose...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Have I... really become such an<n>Umamusume in the eyes of
others?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Am I really their ace? Am I inspiring<n>everyone to chase their
dreams?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hic... Ah... Waaaugh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen breaks into tears,<n>releasing all of the
pressure that had<n>built up within her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Um... I've returned.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh, hey there!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Welcome back, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
What would Grandmother think if she<n>knew that one of her
precious ladies<n>was spending her time out late at<n>night?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: We were worried about you,<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Not only did I fail to win today's race,<n>but I also caused you
all to worry so<n>much. I'm not sure what to say...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey now, that's so not the point!No more gloomy words from you,missy!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: H-hey! What on—what are you doing!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You've got somethin' to say, right?<n>People hear you better
when you<n>speak from on high, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm going to go back out there and<n>run, my head held high!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I might lose again, and I might even<n>cry!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But despite that, I will shoulder your<n>hopes and keep
running—as your<n>team's ace!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: You go, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I'm always, always going to believe<n>in you!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Let's go, ace!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: You know, that was pretty cool,<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Let's keep running together for as<n>long as we can!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It looks like you figured out how to<n>turn those expectations
into strength,<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
G-geez, I've said everything on my<n>mind. You can let me
down now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The laughs coming from the training<n>staff room continue to
echo through<n>the halls late into the night.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: One month later...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Aahhh... I'm getting all nervous!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah, why does it feel like this when<n>it's not even our race?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That's because you see some of<n>your own hopes and
dreams in me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And that is exactly what is going to<n>propel me forward
today.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Get out there and snatch that Grand<n>Prix Umamusume title,
McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I'll be back soon!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One year ago, Oguri Cap made a<n>miracle happen at the
Arima Kinen.<n>And today, we stand ready to make<n>our mark
at the very same race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One year ago, Oguri Cap made a<n>miracle happen at the
Arima Kinen.<n>And today, we stand ready to make<n>our mark
at the very same race.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Welcome to the year's final major<n>bout, the Arima Kinen!
The race is<n>about to start!
